articles.title: Bandcamp’s new owner lays off half the company - TechCrunch
articles.description: Songtradr confirmed that "50% of employees received offers" to continue on under the new ownership — and naturally the other 50% didn't.
articles.content: Bandcamp has officially changed hands from its old new owner, Epic, to its new new owner, Songtradr, and lost half its employees in the process. Songtradr confirmed that “50% of employees received of… [+2633 chars]

articles.title: Explaining the Transition to Riot IDs from Summoner Names - Riot Games
articles.description: This updates player name terminology to better reflect the current world of League of Legends, creates more fluidity between Riot games, and streamlines how names work from a tech perspective.
articles.content: On November 20, 2023, we’ll be phasing out the usage of “Summoner Names” and moving all players exclusively to Riot IDs to create a more unified experience across all our games. We understand there m… [+1500 chars]

articles.title: World Spine Day: With advanced diagnostic technique and treatment, spinal tumor patients are living a quality life in India - Punekar News
articles.description:
Pune, 16th October 2023: Every 16 October is celebrated as World Spine day to raise awareness about spine problems & the theme is Move your Spine , said Dr Shailesh Hadgaonkar Chief Spine Surgeon & Head Neuroscience Unit at Sancheti Hospital Pune.
